title: o/t .. FS.. Yankees 2010 Tickets. Field Level
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: o/t .. FS.. Yankees 2010 Tickets. Field Level
posts.post_content:
Hey everyone.. I wasnt sure where to post this... but Im a big T206 guy so this is where I always post my "for sales"...
I have upgraded my yankee season tickets this year to field level.. section 134 row 17 seats 9 and 10... this section starts in row 11, so row 17 is only 7 rows back from the field... Here is a picture of the view from the seats..
[IMG]http://i251.photobucket.com/albums/gg309/blunder19/Yankesbox136.jpg[/IMG]

Im selling these for $190 a game which is face value at $95 a ticket... here is a list of games I am selling...
             
       YANKEES 2010 TICKETS!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I will include 2 of premium games at face value. you can pick any 8 from above and 2 premium games...Please email me if interested in any single games, single premium games, or 10 game packages..at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url]

Jamie 
Go Yanks!
Games are starting to move... once april gets here they start to fly... let me know if you want me to set one aside for you.
